{/* Hero Section */}

Powering the Future Responsibly

First Nations-led battery recycling for a sustainable EV revolution

{/* Key Stats */}
95%

Critical minerals recovered

2030

Carbon-neutral target

100%

Indigenous-owned

{/* Why AKI Matters */}

Why the World Needs AKI

🚗 The EV Boom Demands Solutions

By 2030, over 30 million EVs will hit roads annually, creating 11+ million tons of battery waste. Without recycling, this becomes an environmental crisis.

🌎 Reducing Mining's Footprint

Our closed-loop system cuts mining demand by up to 70%, preserving ecosystems and reducing water contamination.

🇨🇦 Securing North America's Supply Chain

We break foreign reliance on critical minerals—China currently controls 80% of global battery material refining.

{/* Process Flow */}

Our Circular Process

Collection → Black Mass Production → Hydrometallurgical Refining
